messages.message: Accidentally deleted your request. Think I rectified situation hope so. Meant to accept your request.

Brian
I have started writing down every "coincidence" that I notice, at the end of my life I will be able to prove how my reaction led to my success.  I can only prove it at the end with productivity, but practicing it helps me realize the opportunities now!
Quite an endeavor.

Brian
We need to discount every political post we come across with positive logic and reason.
That is a job.

Brian
I am tired of the trash from the media outlets.  I agree its too much work.

I have not found a media outlet I trust anymore.
They all have a great deal of spin

Brian
I agree 100%  Its awful.  They change their headlines based on their audience.  How do we fight that?  By everyone trolling with positivity and changing their minds.

I guess. Look at all the coverage trump has gotten. & fox news blatantly biased lies.
Gotta go.  Later.

Brian
I agree.  But does it come from honesty, how is more honest, Trump or Hillary?
See what I mean by hard questions?
trump lies so much the Republican networks have started fact checking him.

Brian
Politics is a huge waste of time.

Went to sleep in my chair.
Whacked out today.

Brian
Yeah I was really foggy yesterday after watching Waking Life with my wife. Everything made sense this time, it didn't 10 years ago to me.
I don't think I ever saw that.  I couldn't sleep last night so I took a herbal medicine. Maybe I took much.

Brian
What do you get out of the herbs? Waking Life is very smart. And not religious even if it sounds like it.

I am a night person by nature, living in a day world sometimes if I don't take something I will be awake until 7 am & I will return to being a real night person. I worked nights for years because of it.The only herbs I take are valerian & melatonin.

Brian
So you are aware of circadian rhythm?
Oh yes & mine is backwards to what I need.

Brian
How can I help?  What time is it now?
I am ahead of my time.  I can help!

Well I have lived with it all my life. So I just deal with it. I will not take prescription sleep meds. Just herbals. But it looks like as I get older those need to be cut back. Happens 3 or 4 times a year.

Brian
I am completely against prescriptions, I took Retalin as a child and my kidneys are weak.
Ritalinis a terrible drug they used to give to a kid because he asked too many questions or was the least bit active. They wanted classrooms full of zombies & school doctors were quacks.

Brian
One of my posts got reported and removed 
Exactly my experience with school.
Was your post that bad? I keep getting called away.

Brian
Lol that's ok. I am sure it is more important. An emo girl called me creepy and probably reported me.
I don't do much important. Anymore.

Brian
I disagree.  I think everything you do is important to you.  You spent hours today talking to a total stranger about it.  I appreciate your honesty more than I can ever explain.  You taught me something valuable today.
I enjoy it. I am retired & time is what I have a lot of.

Brian
Oh awesome!  My wife's step dad is retired, he spends all his time on art projects.

Brian
Your entire conversation helped me speak to my estranged father and have a more informed conversation with him about his views on responsibility and my generation.  You have made an impact on me that extends yourself.  That is where I started this conversation talking about God.  I see God in you.

I am an atheist.
I am glad to be of help. But I did not think our conversation was that important. Just banter.

Brian
What's more important to me is understanding your existence.  In some small way if I am ever encountered with this, I'll have some understand of where the conversation is going.
Plus if you watch Waking Life and like it, then I will have a positive affect on you too.
People are so afraid to have a personal conversation online we just spew our comments out with little regard for the noise it created.
